I'm fucking sick of ranked
Perhaps stop building nashor's tooth on fizz and you might see some improvement. xD
Nashors tooth is a perfectly good item on fizz lol

Fizz's power comes from being able to kill squishy opponents from the fight before moving onto the tankier ones. You essentially waste 900 gold building that item. If you built morellonomicon, you'd only be spending 2400 as opposed to 3000 gold. Morello gives the same amount of AP, the same amount of CDR, gives you mana to help with mana problems, and applies grevious wounds, meaning adc's using heal will heal significantly less, meaning you'll be more successful in assassination, for less gold.

Ranked system is working as intended. Your builds aren't optimal, you die too often, you're at the place you belong. I know it sounds harsh but it's just how it is. If you stop thinking about why other people got placed in higher divisions than you and start focusing on your own game play you may possibly improve and get out.

Wins arent what matters, Your kda and the general normal skill level/experience the system thinks you have also matter
trust me if he doesnt belong there he will drop right down to bronze 5 like I did when I won 2 and got b3 I just had positive scores, 400 ranked games later im constantly going from b2 b1 b2 b1 b2 b1 because it is probably were I belong, when I drop lower than b3 I instantly have winstreaks because I dont belong in that elo

You're kidding right? The only thing after the game that determines your opponents is if you win or not. It doesn't care about how you win, if you won then that's that, and the system will put you against harder and harder opponents based on if you continually win.

What was the order in which you won/loss those games? If you win early in your provisionals you will place higher than if you were to win those same games at the end of your provisionals. If you win early the more MMR you'll gain and so the players you verse will be higher level in the future. If you lose early then your MMR will lower the more games you lose.
